topics.body:
Wow; the director of homeland security in the usa just outright admitted his department can't do anything to stop terrorists.

If you're wondering what I'm talking about basically the guy had a discussion about terrorism in the usa, I'm summarizing here for a bit, but basically the thing he is worried about is lone wolf terrorists and that he doesn't know how to stop them.  It's been thirteen fucking years since 9/11 and they finally fucking admit they can't stop lone wolf attacks.  I'm actually kind of shocked here cause the entire department has for years gone, "we can stop terrorist attacks without any evidence that we're effective at it and without any actual evidence that we have stopped any attacks and ignoring attacks like the boston bombing" and they're just now admitting they can't stop lone wolf attacks.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546b370063687224c81c0200#post_546b370063687224c81c0200

Are they expecting a fucking medal for that? That the people pat their backs ans congratulate them for being honest?

"@Background Pony #BA47":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546b450f6368720576450000#post_546b450f6368720576450000
Honestly I think it's more of someone at the top of the chain of command finally was intelligent.  If I was required to list off every last stupid idiot in a high position of political power in the usa I would probably die of old age beforehand.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
